Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
The newspaper is delivered <BLUE>weekly</BLUE>.
It has weather forecasts, and useful
articles about farm life. Read it!
<PAGE>
Letters come at irregular intervals.
They include store announcements of new
products in stock, so read your letters!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you need to refer to this information
again later, you'll find it on your
<BLUE>bookshelf</BLUE> at home.
